channel.title: Help on Moparscape
channel.description: How can I play with other people on Moparscape with a mac? And if I can't, how can i change the hair style of the default dude, and make the monsters fight me? Thanks alot :|

item.title: Help on Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

Go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.msg70691.html#msg70691

Then scroll to big red text then read underneath it.

download the zip file for linux/mac here (note this is the same, but you have to extract it yourself, which is apparantly beyond most noobs)

Read full topic
